definitions: Cleans or rubs hard with a brush or rough material.
Cancels or abandons a plan or mission.
Removes or eliminates something, especially from a recording or data.
Undergoes a process of cleaning or purification.
examples: She scrubs the floor every morning.
The team scrubs the mission due to bad weather.
The editor scrubs the inappropriate content.
The wound scrubs clean after the antiseptic.
